title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: In the 2020 Emilia-Romagna regional election on 26 January, Schlein ran as a candidate for member of the regional council of Emilia-Romagna as part of a left-wing electoral alliance called Emilia-Romagna Courageous Ecologist and Progressive. She was elected with over 22,000 votes, the highest ...

title: Elly Schlein: The first woman and LGBTIQ+ leader of Italy’s left | openDemocracy
snippet: Unlike Meloni, who climbed the political ladder as a loyal member of Italy’s post-fascist, national-conservative tradition, she has tip-toed around the margins of the PD since it was founded in 2007.

title: 4 Things to Know About Elly Schlein, Face of Italy's Largest Opposition Party | ITALY Magazine
snippet: Schlein is poised to become an ever more present political thorn in the side of the current prime minister, Giorgia Meloni — a hard-line conservative from the ultra-right wing Fratelli d'Italia (Brothers of Italy) party.

title: 8th parliamentary term | Elly SCHLEIN | MEPs | European Parliament

title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: After cutting her political teeth across the Atlantic, Schlein became an impassioned youth activist for the Democratic Party and was elected as a member of the European Parliament in 2014.
